name: ORCA
instructions: For this task, you will see some Chinese characters and English wordsâ€¦
Respond with your first instinct whether the English word and Chinese character are a correct match.
After you make your choice, a new pair of words will be shown.
For each pair, you will not be told whether you made the correct choice or not. [br][/br] You will learn the correct matches by seeing the pairs repeated over time.
